PostToolUse.description: Auto-format and verify TypeScript after edits

hooks.command: npx prettier --write $FILE && npx tsc --noEmit $FILE || echo 'TypeScript check failed - fix errors!'

PostToolUse.description: Verify test includes real integration tests

hooks.command: grep -q 'mock\|Mock\|stub\|Stub' $FILE && echo '⚠️  WARNING: Detected mocks - ensure real integration tests exist!' || echo '✅ No mocks detected'

Stop.description: Run REAL tests (not mocks) and verify results after task completion

hooks.command: echo '🧪 Running REAL tests...' && npm test 2>&1 | tee test-output.log && echo '📊 Analyzing test results...' && grep -i 'mock\|stub' test-output.log && echo '⚠️  WARNING: Mock-based tests detected - HIGH RISK!' || echo '✅ Tests appear to use real implementations'

Stop.description: Verify build and check for over-engineering

hooks.command: npm run build && echo '🔍 Checking for over-engineering...' && find src -name '*.ts' -exec wc -l {} + | sort -nr | head -10 && echo '⚠️  Files above 200 lines may be over-engineered'
